content:
A minor thing I wanted to ask about is whether or not anyone thinks it is important for the lint documentation to reflect edition differences. I'm referring to rustc -W help and this page, neither of which currently knows how to handle edition-switching lints. I think #81244 would be the first of such lints, and I'm concerned that people may be confused if they look at the docs and it says one thing (that it is a "warning") but in reality it is different (it is "deny" in 2021).

I don't know if anyone actually looks at those docs, so it may not matter. Just wanted to see if anyone else would care.
Good catch, @Eric Huss, that seems pretty important.
I think i would prefer it to present the newest edition as the canonical thing
with maybe some disclosure triangle to see older editions
